title: Draven assist interaction
body:
Hey
I just thought about Draven and his personality.  He already get's extra Gold for kills but I still miss something special about him getting assists. Something like a Quote e.g."Just an assist? That's Not Worth my time" or "An assist? Embarassing..." or even a hidden passive where He get's 10 less gold per assist.
What are you all thinking about That?  I Would just love it :D

replies.body: Draven ist nicht dafür bestimmt assists bekommen!.. :p
Gerade deswegen soll er ja so reagieren. (Er verachtet assists)... wenn man halt sagt, dass er gar kein Geld für assists kriegt wäre das ziemlich unfair
